items.title: How I Built A $1M/Year Business - And Helped My Parents Retire

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Tuan Le emigrated from Vietnam to Toronto in 2015 and vowed at age 15 to help his parents retire. Ten years later his social video production company, ShortsCut, generates over $1 million USD annually, and he now pays his parents' rent and living expenses so they no longer work full time.

items.title: AI w cenach transferowych â€“ jak wykorzystaÄ‡ jej potencjaÅ‚? | Monika Palmowska, Jakub Roszkiewicz

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this KPMG ON AIR episode with Monika Palmowska and Jakub Roszkiewicz examines how AI is already affecting transfer pricingâ€”from monitoring rentability and comparable analyses to automating documentation. The discussion covers implementation steps (including ERP integration and Digital Gateway), risks such as data security, RODO and hallucinations, and emphasizes that AI will augment rather than replace tax advisors.
bullets: AI applications: monitoring profitability, comparative analyses, and automation of transfer pricing documentation.
Practical implementation topics: integration with ERP, intelligent benchmarks, and secure environments like Digital Gateway.
AI strengthens advisorsâ€™ work and supports development of junior staff, rather than fully replacing experts.
Key risks highlighted: data protection, security, GDPR (RODO) concerns and AI hallucinations.
Recommended starting points: first steps for AI deployment and importance of organizing processes as a foundation.
takeaways: Prioritize data governance and GDPR (RODO) compliance before deploying AI tools for tax/transfer-pricing tasks.
Use secure environments (e.g., Digital Gateway) to mitigate data security and privacy risks when working with AI.
Plan for ERP integration and intelligent benchmarking to realize operational benefits from AI-driven monitoring and reporting.
Begin AI initiatives by organizing processes and upskilling teams, since AI is positioned to augment advisors and junior staff.
